name: Soccer Fun Run - The World Fantasy Football Players From The Ultimate Cup
name_original: Soccer Fun Run - The World Fantasy Football Players From The Ultimate Cup
description:
******* Free Soccer Arcade Game! *******

******* Addicting platformer action ******

Help our strong athlete collect coins in his biggest adventure ever!

Kick your way through worlds of intense platforming madness in this tough-as-nails classic arcade game! This is a retro-style platformer with cute animation, awesome soundtrack and challenging levels!

With exceptionally clever level design, gorgeous graphics and solid platform dynamics you'll want to keep playing and playing.

Have you got what it takes to win in this classic side scrolling action adventure?

Features:

* Multiple levels of excitement
* Awesome animations
* Optimized performance
* Smooth and polished gameplay
* Exciting music tracks

Harness the power of pure fun!

Download FREE Today!
